summary: Kremvh is one of my first mods and please download and help me test him! Kremvh is waiting for you at....
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Hello all! And welcome to your game Kremvh The argonian! I know you are wondering, well why on earth should I get him instead of 3 custom voiced followers...
 1. he hates nazeem and braith.
 2. he doesn't really like sven or faendal.
 3. he will do any favors.... no matter how... hilarious.
 4. he is romancible.

but anyway you can find him in jorvaskkyr in whiterun.


Note: he has not been tested but once. please report any bugs please.[/font]
author: TheTrueForgeMaster
